ch.nolix.common.interfaces

Interface OptionalNamable<ON extends OptionalNamable<?>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Area, BorderableRectangle, Button, CheckBox, ConfigurableElement, ConfigurationElement, Container, Definition, Dialog, DialogContainer, Equality, Expression, Frame, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InnerDialog, Label, Line, MockDialog, OptionalNamableElement, Rectangle, Scope, SingleContainer, Stack, TabContainer, TextBox, TextLineRectangle, Theory, VerticalLine, VerticalStack

    public interface OptionalNamable<ON extends OptionalNamable<?>>
    A namable element is an object that can have a name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this namable object
        Throws:

        default java.lang.String getNameInQuotes()
        Returns:
        the name of this namable objectsurrounded by apostrophes
